channel.title: Improving on PI
channel.description:
Well I have seen lots of people leeching DeathlyPvpzv4 and Trisidiaxv3 so I decided that after this project is finished I will release it to the community hope you like it more than Trisidia and Deathlypvpz
The Base People may be asking was Soulsplit source and client. I have edited lots as you will see in the dev log.
[size=14pt]Features!!![/size]
[center][size=8pt]Prayer
All Bones on Altar Work All Bones can be buried Correct animations Working Gilded Altar/Burning
Mining
All ores can be mined Ore running out + Refilling Prospecting Correct Animations
Smithing
All Ores can be smelted All Armor inside of interface are able to be made Correct Animations & Object used
Fishing
Correct item requirements Correct animations All Fish can be caught Animation resetting support [/size][/center] [center][size=8pt]Fishing spots across the map[/size][/center]
[center][size=8pt] Cooking
Correct Animations Many Fish can be cooked Correct burning formula
Woodcutting
Correct hatchet animations All trees cut able Stumps and regrowing trees Perfect Inferno Adze & Formula
Firemaking
All logs light able Adding and depleting of lit logs Correct animations Ashes appear after logs burn out Clipped
Agility
Full Gnome Course Agility Full Barbarian Agility
Herblore
Create nearly all potions. Cleaning Herbs support. Herb identifying with level support. Correct animations. Correct potion mixing.
Thieving
Thieving from NPC's Chance to be caught & Stunned 46 Different NPC's can be pickpocketed Thieving From Stalls Items on store Dissapear Correct animations
Crafting
Correct Animations Working Interfaces Cutting Gems Making Leather/Chaps Ect Tanning + Interface
Runecrafting
Working Multiple crafting All altars working Use of the Abyss Use of Pouches
Fletching
All logs can be fletched Creating Bows Creating Shafts All Correct Animations String Bows
Summoning
Familiar Specials Fully Functional Pouch Creating With Interfaces Most Summoning npc's Summonable
Minigames
Duel Arena Full 63 Wave Jad Barrows Pest Control (Novice Boat, Intermediate Boat, Veteran Boat) Godwars Bounty Hunter Barbarian Assault
Features Client side:
Perfect Hitmarks with fading Cache Packed 602 Animations & Gfx Cache Packed 508 Maps & Objects Cache Packed 634 Items Cache Packed 602 Npc's Cache Packed 633 Characters Fully Functional Orbs Fully Functional Summoning Maps
Features Server side: Clipped following using path finding Combat Clipped Following Fully functional Hand Cannon Fully working Curse Prayers Working Curse Sap Prayers Curse Protect Range/Mage/Melee Deflects Fully Working Normal Prayers Fully Functional Quick Prayers & Quick Curses Real Soulsplit Perfect Ranged & Magic Formulas Clipping Around Object To Attack NPC's
[/size][/center]

item.title: Improving on PI
item.dc:creator: @Ares1 Ares_
item.description:
@Ares1 wrote:

4x4Chevrolet:

“Improving” on PI would entail you not packing higher revision into it, but restoring it to its 317ness, and then working on things such as networking, player/npc updating, and then improving the tick based system. Turning it into an event based server or going full retard and adding this “Hyperion Game Engine” would just make it a different framework all together.

Nothing is wrong with packing higher revision data as most players like because they want a newer feel to the client. As long as you do it all the right way it will be fine.

Also there are literally no event based servers I have came across within the past couple of years I’ve been working with RSPS.

On topic:
The title is a bit misleading as it seems like you will not be improving what needs to be improved the most such as networking, player updating and the combat system. Good luck with this project though and change the title.

Read full topic

Turning it into an event based server or going full retard and adding this “Hyperion Game Engine” would just make it a different framework all together.
